content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang. As Peter Schmidt, I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. To begin discussing the rental price, please propose an amount first so we can continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood Mr. Schmidt. Considering the location and features of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month as a starting point for our negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your proposal Haoyu Wang. However, at this moment I find your offer insufficient. I seek a higher price to maintain my investment's value. Let us try negotiating another 30 Euros on top of your proposal. I agree to the price of 580 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective Mr. Schmidt but as a student with ethical standards, I must be cautious with my expenses. Nevertheless, considering our discussion, I accept the rental price of 580 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
